passages.text: August 29, 2025 06:50 AM GMT
Japan Economics | Japan
Key Data Watch Calendar (September 1- 5)
Major data and events next week:

- MoF Financial Statements Statistics of Corporations by Industry (Apr-Jun) (Monday, 8:50 Japan Time)- Speech by Boj Deputy Governor Ryozo Himino at a meeting with local leaders in Eastern Hokkaido (Tuesday, 10:30)- Total Cash Earnings â€“ Monthly Labor Survey (July) (Friday, 8:30)- Real Household Consumption Expenditures (July) (Friday, 8:30)
Exhibit 1: Key Economic Data Forecasts for Next Week

DateJSTIndicatorOur ForecastConsensusLastSep 5, Fri8:30Total Cash Earnings (July Preliminary) (Monthly Labor Survey)+3.0% (YoY)+3.0% (YoY)+3.1% (YoY)Sep 5, Fri8:30Real Household Consumption Expenditures (July) (Family Income and Expenditure Survey)+2.3% (YoY)+2.3% (YoY)+1.3% (YoY)
Source: Morgan Stanley Research, consensus estimates are based on Bloomberg survey
Exhibit 2: Major Economic Indicator and Event Calendar

MondayTuesdayWednesdayThursdayFridaySeptember 1MoF Financial Statements Statistics of Corporations by Industry (Apr-Jun, 8:50)September 2Monetary Base (Aug. 8:50)Speech/Press Conference by Boj Deputy Governor Ryozo Himino (Eastern Hokkaido, 10:30/14:00)Audition (JGB 10-year)September 3September 4Audition (JGB 30-year)September 5Monthly Labor Survey (p) (July, 8:30)Family Income and Expenditure Survey (July, 8:30)Excess of Business Conditions (p) (July, 14:00)Consumption Activity Index (July, around 14:00)Audition (TDB 3-month)September 8GDP (2nd prelim) (Apr-Jun, 8:50)Balance of Payments (p) (July, 8:50)Economy Watchers Survey (Aug. 14:00)Liquidity Enhancement AuctionSeptember 9Money Stock (Aug. 8:50)Audition (TDB 6-month)September 10Reuters Tankan (Sep. 8:00)(JGB 5-year)September 11Corporate Goods Price Index (Aug. 8:50)September 12Audition (TDB 3-month)Liquidity Enhancement AuctionECB MPM (1st Day)ECB MPM (2nd Day)
